title: Stocks to Watch: What to Watch in the Markets this Week
description: Barron's senior writer Nicholas Jasinski will be joined by Truist Advisory Services' co-CIO Keith Lerner, who uses a mix of fundamental and technical factors in his analysis. They'll discuss the outlook for the stock market and industry sectors, Federal Reserve policy, and how to position portfolios for the months and year ahead.
